name: dungeon & heros
description:
Dungeon & heros is a turn-based Roguelite RPG , which involves recruiting and developing your hero's team, exploring randomly generated maps, collecting equipment and element of spirit , diverse Build gameplay with the diverse transfer system to create the strongest team in the endless cycle. Game Features [/ h2]
  • diverse transfer system, each hero can make multiple vocation changes, dozens of vocation to choose from.
  • Wind, fire, thunder and ice four elements of sprits system, make the different skill effects.
  • Different equipment prefixes, and dozens of equipment sets,keep collecting in each stage.
  • Randomly generated maps and monster combinations.
  • Note that the hero cannot be resurrected from the dead.

Story Background

Otherworld has been cut into countless fragmented Spaces. You come to the Otherworld as a summoner, with the ability to lead a few people through these Spaces. You will select the elite hero to form a team, constantly explore in these void, find the person behind the chaos, and restore the normal order of the Otherworld.
